channel.title: Adjuvants on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Adjuvants on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Effect of alternative aluminum adjuvants on the absorption and immunogenicity of HPV16 L1 VLPs in mice
item.description: This articles compares the immune response to these new adjuvants with aluminum hydroxide on mice. The authors happily conclude that both of the new adjuvants induce an immune response 3-8 greater than the immune response to aluminum hydroxide. For some reason they never mention that eightfold immune response also means an eightfold risk of the autoimmune response.
